<h3 id="X35841">X(35841) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES TO 1st EHRMANN</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^4-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^2+3*b^4+3*c^4-2*b^2*c^2+2*(a^2+c^2+b^2)*S)  :  :
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(35841) lies on these lines:
{3,6}, {51,8854}, {69,486}, {141,10577}, {159,35777}, {193,638}, {265,35876}, {343,8281}, {394,8855}, {485,14853}, {518,35642}, {524,35823}, {542,35754}, {590,18583}, {591,13873}, {611,35808}, {613,35768}, {732,35867}, {1328,11180}, {1352,6565}, {1386,35763}, {1469,35769}, {1503,35821}, {1590,8940}, {1843,35765}, {1992,32421}, {2781,35827}, {2854,12376}, {2987,5408}, {3056,35809}, {3070,21850}, {3071,3564}, {3092,12167}, {3242,35811}, {3416,35789}, {3618,5418}, {3751,35775}, {3818,35787}, {5032,26617}, {5413,6403}, {5420,10519}, {5480,6564}, {5846,35843}, {5921,23259}, {5965,35847}, {5969,35879}, {6393,35684}, {6459,8982}, {6561,6776}, {7584,34380}, {8996,19459}, {9024,35883}, {9830,35699}, {9970,12375}, {10576,14561}, {10666,34382}, {11427,18289}, {11579,35826}, {11898,13785}, {12177,35878}, {12221,32982}, {12329,35773}, {12452,35781}, {12453,35779}, {12583,35791}, {12586,35797}, {12587,35799}, {12588,35801}, {12589,35803}, {12590,35807}, {12591,35805}, {12594,35817}, {12595,35819}, {12964,34779}, {13846,14848}, {13910,35815}, {13972,35813}, {18440,23261}, {19140,32291}, {20423,35822}, {22769,35785}, {31670,35820}, {34146,35865}, {35825,35839}, {35873,35875}</p>
<p>
X(35841) = midpoint of X(193) and X(638)<br>
X(35841) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (69, 640), (372, 6), (11825, 13355), (35840, 5028)<br>
X(35841) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 1505, 372), (3, 3312, 8406), (6, 1151, 5050), (6, 1350, 19146), (6, 1351, 35840), (6, 5102, 9974), (6, 12963, 1692), (182, 5107, 35840), (371, 6396, 2460), (371, 35793, 3102), (576, 5052, 35840), (1350, 19146, 6396), (1570, 5058, 6), (3311, 5093, 6), (3371, 3372, 6424), (3592, 15883, 371), (6221, 8589, 6200), (6398, 33872, 2027), (9975, 15883, 11482), (35793, 35795, 371)<br>
</p>
